page.title: 20OUR SCHOOL AND THIS SURVEY
page.content: Our School is St.Joseph's R.C.Primary School,sited in the Avenue,just off the allotted block.The site on which the school is built beloinged to the Sisters of St.Joseph of Annecy & they were the first to ask for this school in the l960's.It was completed &ready for use in Sept.l975,so this year com pletes our lst decade.The Chairman of our Governors,Canon P.A.O'Connell cel ebrated his Golden Jubilee of ordina- tion this year.We celebrated this occ asion in school by Mass & a variety concert & presented him with a Papal Blessing & a quartz alarm clock.There are 119 pupils on roll & 51 were enga- ged on the Doomsday Project.We worked in 12 different groups & covered 12 topics.MrsVeitch(a parent)co-ordinated the project & a parent helped each of the groups. We hope to do another sur- vey in school in 10 years time.
